FeatureSection.name: Name
FeatureSection.title: Dog breed search API
FeatureSection.description: To get started, simply type in the name of the breed you are interested in, and the search will return a variety of information such as breed history, characteristics, temperament, and physical attributes.
FeatureSection.tableDescription: This table shows a list of dog breeds that are available in the API. Click on the breed name to view more details.

HomeSection.description: This API provides feature that allows users to search for specific dog breeds and retrieve detailed information about them. Users can type in the name of the breed they are interested in, and the search will return a variety of information such as breed history, characteristics, temperament, and physical attributes.
HomeSection.title: Dog breed search API
